errorMessages.MAINTENANCE: System under maintenance, please press OK button to exit the application!
errorMessages.FORCE_UPDATE: New version available, please update app to have better experience!
errorMessages.ALERT_UPDATE: New version available, you can update now or do it later. The new one will improve the user interface, enhance performance and fix issues. Don't forget updating!
